articles.title: Quentin Tarantino: Paul Dano Is 'Weakest Male Actor in SAG' - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The Oscar winner called Dano "weak sauce" when discussing his picks for the best films of the 21st century on 'The Bret Easton Ellis Podcast.'

articles.title: Jon M. Chu Moves First-Look Film and TV Deal to Paramount - Variety
articles.description: "Wicked," "Crazy Rich Asians" director Jon M. Chu has inked a new first-look film & TV deal with Paramount Skydance, moving on from Warner Bros.

articles.title: Tara Reid Chicago news: Rosemont police say video shows 'American Pie' actress drink not tampered with at hotel bar, investigating - ABC7 Chicago
articles.description: Rosemont police said they found no video evidence that actress Tara Reid's drink was tampered with at a hotel bar in the alleged drugging investigation, but they are still looking into the incident.

articles.title: Steve Cropper, guitarist and member of Stax Records' Booker T and the M.G.'s, dies - NPR
articles.description: Steve Cropper, who co-wrote classics including "(Sittin' on) the Dock of the Bay" and "In the Midnight Hour" during his years playing guitar at the legendary Stax Records in Memphis, has died. He was 84.

articles.title: Column | This can’t be the future Meghan Markle envisioned - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Duchess of Sussex’s Christmas special features cheese puffs, wreath-making and celebrity guests. But columnist Monica Hesse keeps thinking about Wallis Simpson.

articles.title: Miley Cyrus confirms engagement to musician Maxx Morando - BBC
articles.description: The Grammy winner says she was "so surprised" after her partner of four years proposed on a trip.

articles.title: Criscilla Anderson, wife of country singer Coffey, dies from colon cancer at 45 - USA Today
articles.description: Choreographer to the stars, Criscilla Crossland Anderson, the ex-wife of country music singer Coffey Anderson, has died after battling colon cancer.

articles.title: A new tiara for Kate! The Princess of Wales makes a dazzling debut in a rare ruby and diamond tiara for the German state banquet - Tatler
articles.description: Arriving with Prince William, the Princess of Wales glittered in Queen Victoria's Oriental Circlet Tiara – a piece that has not been seen in 20 years

articles.title: Matthew Perry’s Doctor Sentenced to 30 Months for Supplying Ketamine - Variety
articles.description: Matthew Perry's doctor, Salvador Plasencia, was sentenced Wednesday to 30 months in prison for supplying the actor with ketamine in 2023.

articles.title: Love Is Blind’s Alexa and Brennon Are Getting Divorced - Vulture
articles.description: Alexa and Brennon from ‘Love Is Blind’ season three have split up. Now, no couples from the third season of Netflix’s marquee dating show are still together.

articles.title: HBO Max Touts ‘Euphoria,’ ‘Industry’ in London, Touches on WBD Bidding, and Brings Out Lisa Kudrow to Talk AI-Themed ‘The Comeback’ - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The HBO chief also teases returning and new originals and talks AI with the creative team behind ‘The Comeback.’

articles.title: 5 Most Disturbing Revelations from Netflix’s Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs Docuseries - TV Insider
articles.description: The docuseries explores the mogul’s rise, power, and horrific scandals.

articles.title: Richard Gere on Dalai Lama Documentary ‘Wisdom of Happiness,’ His 20-Year Oscar Ban and Donald Trump: ‘I Don’t Know How You Explain What He Has Done to This Country’ - Variety
articles.description: Richard Gere talks about his Dalai Lama documentary, being banned from the Oscars for 20 years and Donald Trump.

articles.title: The 10 Best Books of 2025 - The Wall Street Journal
"Oh. What. Fun." finally gives moms their Christmas due - Salon.com
articles.description: Michelle Pfeiffer’s familiarly overworked, taken for granted mom stands out from the typical holiday fare.

articles.title: The 100 Best Albums of 2025 - Rolling Stone
articles.description: We rank the best albums of 2025: Lady Gaga, Clipse, Rosalia, Geese and more

articles.title: 2025 Spotify Wrapped: Bad Bunny takes Swift's spot at the top - Axios
articles.description: Drake and The Weeknd also returned to the audio platform's annual list.

articles.title: Spotify Unveils Top 50 Podcasts of 2025, Led by Joe Rogan, Theo Von, Mel Robbins - Variety
articles.description: Spotify, as part of Spotify Wrapped, released the top 50 podcasts of 2025 -- with Joe Rogan coming in at No. 1 for the fifth straight year.

articles.title: White House Doubles Down On Its Ugliness In Reply To Sabrina Carpenter - HuffPost
articles.description: The pop star had blasted Trump & Co. for using her music in an ICE arrest video, and the feud just got uglier.
